mapper.sql: id, device_model_id, device_model, device_sn, field, conditions, description, alarm_id, alarm_level, modify_time, create_user, modify_user, create_time
mapper.select:
select dac.*, dm.device_model_name from t_device_alarm_config dac
left join t_device d on dac.device_sn = d.sn
left join t_device_model dm on dac.device_model = dm.device_model
AND dac.device_model = #{deviceModel} AND dac.device_sn LIKE CONCAT('%',#{deviceSn},'%') AND d.department_id = #{departmentId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_device_alarm_config
id,
device_model_id,
device_model,
device_sn,
field,
conditions,
alarm_Level,
description,
alarm_id,
modify_time,
create_user,
modify_user,
create_time,

#{deviceModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{conditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alarmLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_device_alarm_config
device_model_id = #{deviceModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_model = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_sn = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field = #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_Level = #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=TINYINT},
conditions = #{conditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where alarm_id = #{alarmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_device_alarm_config set device_model_id = #{deviceModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_model = #{deviceModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_sn = #{deviceSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, field = #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conditions = #{conditions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_id = #{alarmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
